splash_content.title: DISCOVER THE BEST FEATURE OF THIS RELEASE

articles.title: 🔥 Oauth support for bounce handling
articles.desc: You can now use Oauth to authenticate with your Gmail or Outlook account to handle bounces.

articles.title: 🔥 New Gif integration in the editor
articles.desc: The Giphy service pricing changed, this integration has been replaced by the Tenor integration in the editor, allowing you to continue inserting GIFs in your emails.

articles.title: 🔥 [Joomla] Integration with Phoca Download
articles.desc: A new integration with Phoca Download has been added.

articles.title: 🔥 [Joomla] Integration with jTicketing and Shika
articles.desc: New integrations for jTicketing and Shika provided by their developers have been listed in the downloadable add-ons.

articles.title: 🎁 New gif integration in the editor
articles.desc: The Giphy service pricing changed, this integration has been replaced by the Tenor integration in the editor, allowing you to continue inserting GIFs in your emails.

articles.title: 🎁 New dynamic text type for your emails
articles.desc: The Website dynamic text type in the editor has been improved, allowing you to insert more dynamic content from your website in your emails.

articles.title: 🎁 Improve the queue pause/resume button
articles.desc: Add a new tooltip on the resume/pause button in the queue.

articles.title: 🧩 Integration with Phoca Download
articles.desc: A new integration with Phoca Download has been added.

articles.title: 🧩 Integration with jTicketing and Shika
articles.desc: New integrations for jTicketing and Shika provided by their developers have been listed in the downloadable add-ons.

articles.title: 🧩 Better handling of Joomla articles images
articles.desc: Inserted articles that do not have the intro image set will now be inserted with their full image in the email.

articles.title: 🧩 JEvents add-on improvement
articles.desc: A new option has been added in the JEvents add-on to let you specify the menu item ID to use when building event links.

articles.title: 🧩 Improve external plugins compatibility
articles.desc: Fixed a display issue when the plugin WPC Product Bundles for WooCommerce is active.

articles.title: 🧩 Improve external plugins compatibility
articles.desc: Fixed a warning error on our external plugins for the uninstall script definition.

articles.title: 🛠 Footer image
articles.desc: Fixed the footer image for free versions that could be shown incorrectly.

articles.title: 🛠 TinyMCE editor custom CSS edition
articles.desc: Fixed an issue for the TinyMCE editor when importing a template with custom CSS that has irregular line return characters.

articles.title: 🛠 Issues with our servers
articles.desc: Fixed an issue for few hosting providers not able to contact our license API

articles.title: 🛠 Mailbox actions
articles.desc: Fixed error preventing to display the listing of mailbox actions

articles.title: 🛠 Make connection
articles.desc: Fixed an issue when connecting from Make.com to AcyMailing

articles.title: 🛠 Import templates for Windows
articles.desc: The templates import has been fixed for Windows users. The file type verification didn't handle non-standard mime types.

articles.title: 🛠 Check database integrity
articles.desc: Fixed the issue of the Check Database Integrity button that was cycling with the same messages of resolved problems for default column values.
